LanguageData.Melee_Shishkebab.label: Shishkebab
LanguageData.Melee_Shishkebab.description: Pyromaniac's favorite. A sword that is capable of setting fire on your enemies. Beware, fireproof equipment not included.
LanguageData.Melee_Shishkebab.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Melee_Shishkebab.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Melee_Shishkebab.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.Melee_Chainsaw.label: chainsaw
LanguageData.Melee_Chainsaw.description: A tool used to chop down trees. Of course, it can also chop your opponents into two pieces.
LanguageData.Melee_Chainsaw.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Melee_Chainsaw.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Melee_Chainsaw.tools.2.label: edge
